General.Name: Realia Properties Inc
General.Description: Realia Properties Inc. engages in the ownership of real property interests in the United States. It focuses on retail and commercial properties, and community centers. The company was formerly known as TitanStar Properties Inc. and changed its name to Realia Properties, Inc. in October 2019. Realia Properties Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 151 Yonge Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 2W7
